info.title: Opc-History-Service
info.description: Azure Industrial IoT OPC UA Historic Access Service

post.summary: Delete value history at specified times
post.description:
Delete value history using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history update request

post.description:
Delete historic values using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history update request

post.description:
Delete historic values using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history update request

post.description:
Delete historic events using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history update request

post.description:
Read node history if available using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history read request

post.summary: Read next batch of history as json
post.description:
Read next batch of node history values using historic access.
The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history read next request

post.summary: Update node history using raw json
post.description:

The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history update request

The endpoint must be activated and connected and the module client
and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history insert request

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history read request

parameters.name: endpointId
parameters.description: The identifier of the activated endpoint.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: The history read next request

Replace historic values using historic access.

and server must trust each other.

parameters.name: request

get.summary:
Return the service status in the form of the service status
api model.

browsePath.description:
An optional path from NodeId instance to
the actual node.

details.description:
The HistoryUpdateDetailsType extension object
encoded as json Variant and containing the tunneled
update request for the Historian server. The value
is updated at edge using above node address.

locales.description: Optional list of locales in preference order.

level.description:
Requested level of response diagnostics.
(default: Status)

auditId.description:
Client audit log entry.
(default: client generated)

results.description: List of results from the update operation

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of service call error

statusCode.description: Error code - if null operation succeeded.

errorMessage.description: Error message in case of error or null.

browsePath.description:

the actual node.

details.description:

encoded as json Variant and containing the tunneled
update request for the Historian server. The value
is updated at edge using above node address.

browsePath.description:
An optional path from NodeId instance to
the actual node.

details.description:
The HistoryReadDetailsType extension object
encoded in json and containing the tunneled
Historian reader request.

indexRange.description:
Index range to read, e.g. 1:2,0:1 for 2 slices
out of a matrix or 0:1 for the first item in
an array, string or bytestring.
See 7.22 of part 4: NumericRange.

history.description: History as json encoded extension object

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of error

continuationToken.description:
Continuation token to continue reading more
results.

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

details.description:
The HistoryUpdateDetailsType extension object
encoded as json Variant and containing the tunneled
update request for the Historian server. The value
is updated at edge using above node address.

statusCode.description: The status code associated with the value.

sourceTimestamp.description: The source timestamp associated with the value.

sourcePicoseconds.description: Additional resolution for the source timestamp.

serverTimestamp.description: The server timestamp associated with the value.

serverPicoseconds.description: Additional resolution for the server timestamp.

update request for the Historian server. The value
is updated at edge using above node address.

filter.description: The filter to use to select the events

eventFields.description: The selected fields of the event

browsePath.description:
An optional path from NodeId instance to
the actual node.

details.description:
The HistoryReadDetailsType extension object
encoded in json and containing the tunneled
Historian reader request.

indexRange.description:
Index range to read, e.g. 1:2,0:1 for 2 slices
out of a matrix or 0:1 for the first item in
an array, string or bytestring.
See 7.22 of part 4: NumericRange.

filter.description: The filter to use to select the event fields

history.description: History as json encoded extension object

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of error

history.description: History as json encoded extension object

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of error

browsePath.description:
An optional path from NodeId instance to
the actual node.

details.description:
The HistoryReadDetailsType extension object
encoded in json and containing the tunneled
Historian reader request.

indexRange.description:
Index range to read, e.g. 1:2,0:1 for 2 slices
out of a matrix or 0:1 for the first item in
an array, string or bytestring.
See 7.22 of part 4: NumericRange.

startTime.description:
Beginning of period to read. Set to null
if no specific start time is specified.

endTime.description:
End of period to read. Set to null if no
specific end time is specified.

numValues.description:
The maximum number of values returned for any Node
over the time range. If only one time is specified,
the time range shall extend to return this number
of values. 0 or null indicates that there is no
maximum.

returnBounds.description: Whether to return the bounding values or not.

history.description: History as json encoded extension object

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of error

useServerCapabilitiesDefaults.description: Whether to use the default server caps

treatUncertainAsBad.description: Whether to treat uncertain as bad

percentDataBad.description: Percent of data that is bad

percentDataGood.description: Percent of data that is good

startTime.description: The start time to read from

endTime.description: The end time to read to

numValues.description: The number of values to read

continuationToken.description: Continuation token if more results pending.

errorInfo.description: Service result in case of error

uid.description:
Value generated at bootstrap by each instance of the service and
used to correlate logs coming from the same instance. The value
changes every time the service starts.

properties.description: A property bag with details about the service

dependencies.description: A property bag with details about the internal dependencies
